shortDescription: In the module Facebook (pkfacebook) <=1.0.1 from Promokit.eu for PrestaShop, a guest can perform SQL injection. The ajax script facebookConnect.php have a sensitive SQL call that can be executed with a trivial http call and exploited to forge a SQL injection.
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
